pr_title: Add Reason Param to Protocol NAK Base

timeline.message: Add Reason Param to Protocol NAK Base

timeline.bodyText: RegisterSecondaryTransportNAK already has a reason so it should be removed from that specific NAK as it exists in the base class now.
timeline.author: bilal-alsharifi

timeline.bodyText:
The reason value for all NAKs messages should be printed as a warning similar to how we do it here:

  
    
      sdl_java_suite/base/src/main/java/com/smartdevicelink/protocol/SdlProtocolBase.java
    
    
         Line 1428
      in
      7f12aef
    
    
    
    

        
          
           String reason = (String) packet.getTag(ControlFrameTags.RPC.RegisterSecondaryTransportNAK.REASON);
timeline.author: bilal-alsharifi

timeline.message: Add logging and remove redundent reason
